lead_paragraph: ZIELINSKI--Erica Herzig, of Old Bridge, NJ and formerly of Manalapan, NJ and Manhattan, passed away at her home on Sunday, December 27th. She received her master's degree from Columbia University and became a nurse practitioner, specializing in women's health for over 40 years, most recently at New York University. She retired in December 2014. Erica is survived by her loving husband of 32 years, Thomas James Zielinski of Old Bridge; son, Adam Zielinski of Asbury Park; daughter, Brenna Zielinski of Manhattan; and sister, Beth Herzig of Miami. Family and friends are invited to gather at the Old Bridge Funeral Home, 2350 Rt. 516, Old Bridge, NJ 08857 on Saturday, January 9, 2016 from 10:30am to 12:30pm for a memorial visitation. There will be a memorial service beginning at 12:30pm at the funeral home. In lieu of flowers, Erica's family requests you donate to "The Erica Herzig- Zielinski Charitable Fund" more information can be found at www.oldbridge fh.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ZIELINSKI, ERICA HERZIG
